name: Vamier Mansion
description:
Warning: Contains blood and gore Chapter 1:

You wake up one night on a dark, quiet street alone. What’s more, you realize you have somehow lost your memories. While trying all your might to remember anything, a stranger appears and offers you a place to stay. What will you do from then on?
